originalText.text: I had the pleasure of working with Blacker & Kooby on our wedding invitations. I wanted to design the invitations myself as well as support a local business and they not only provided top-notch printing quality but also went above and beyond in helping us with the addressing and envelopes. Thank you Andrea & Vanessa!

text.text: I had the pleasure of working with Blacker & Kooby on our wedding invitations. I wanted to design the invitations myself as well as support a local business and they not only provided top-notch printing quality but also went above and beyond in helping us with the addressing and envelopes. Thank you Andrea & Vanessa!

originalText.text: I adore this shop and everyone that works there. I made an appointment to get personalized stationery for a good friend, who just started an amazing job. Andrea helped me pick out the most stunning cards and then walked me through which fonts would go best. I needed a professional to help make it perfect. Then she and the gentleman, who handles the pens, worked with me to pick out a pen that was professional, wrote beautifully and would make a statement without being flashy or too feminine. My friend was absolutely over the moon about the present. Andrea was a joy to work with and everyone else was so pleasant and professional. No other stationery shop is getting my business.

originalText.text: This is a âœ¨magicalâœ¨ place full of lovely, fun, quirky, and creative stationery supplies! There was another man whose name I didnâ€™t catch, but he knew every inch of the store and was able to find the other missing elements to package my gift! originalText.text: We had such a wonderful experience here! Andrea helped us to design the most perfect wedding invitations. She listened to my design ideas, provided really helpful suggestions, and was incredibly patient with me as we worked through rounds of edits to make everything just right. She even figured out how to make a pattern I loved into such a gorgeous envelope liner.

She even figured out how to make a pattern I loved into such a gorgeous envelope liner.
